action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_hub_step_instance</document><document_key>c49ff45b41cbea107f44d123d9c629ec</document_key><order>600</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-04 06:56:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>809ff45b41cbea107f44d123d9c629fa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-04 23:12:02</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
// 
// Create a map to track how many devices each user has processed
var userDeviceCount = {};

var compGR = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci_computer');
compGR.addQuery('assigned_to', '!=', '');         // Only include records with assigned users
compGR.addQuery('sys_class_name', 'cmdb_ci_computer');             // Filter to only records where class == 'computer'
compGR.orderBy('assigned_to');                    // Optional: sort for consistency
compGR.query();

while (compGR.next()) {
    var user = compGR.assigned_to.getRefRecord();

    if (user && user.department) {
        var dept = user.department.getRefRecord();

        if (dept && dept.name && user.first_name) {
            var deptName = dept.name.toString().trim().toUpperCase();
            var firstName = user.first_name.toString().trim().toUpperCase();
            var userKey = user.sys_id.toString();

            // Initialize or increment counter for this user
            if (!userDeviceCount[userKey]) {
                userDeviceCount[userKey] = 1;
            } else {
                userDeviceCount[userKey]++;
            }

            // Build the new name
            var suffix = userDeviceCount[userKey] === 1 ? '' : userDeviceCount[userKey];
            var newName = deptName + ' - ' + firstName + suffix;

            // Update if needed
            if (compGR.name.toString() !== newName) {
                var oldName = compGR.name.toString();
                compGR.name = newName;
                compGR.update();
                gs.info('Updated: ' + oldName + ' → ' + newName);
            }
        }
    }
}

})(inputs, outputs);

step</label><order>1</order><outputs/><section/><step_type display_value="Script">106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7</step_type><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-04 action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_hub_step_instance</document><document_key>959f385b41cbea107f44d123d9c629ec</document_key><order>600</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-04 06:56:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>1d9f785b41cbea107f44d123d9c62902</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-04 23:12:16</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
// 
// Create a map to track how many devices each user has processed
var userDeviceCount = {};

var compGR = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci_computer');
compGR.addQuery('assigned_to', '!=', '');         // Only include records with assigned users
compGR.addQuery('sys_class_name', 'cmdb_ci_computer');             // Filter to only records where class == 'computer'
compGR.orderBy('assigned_to');                    // Optional: sort for consistency
compGR.query();

while (compGR.next()) {
    var user = compGR.assigned_to.getRefRecord();

    if (user && user.department) {
        var dept = user.department.getRefRecord();

        if (dept && dept.name && user.first_name) {
            var deptName = dept.name.toString().trim().toUpperCase();
            var firstName = user.first_name.toString().trim().toUpperCase();
            var userKey = user.sys_id.toString();

            // Initialize or increment counter for this user
            if (!userDeviceCount[userKey]) {
                userDeviceCount[userKey] = 1;
            } else {
                userDeviceCount[userKey]++;
            }

            // Build the new name
            var suffix = userDeviceCount[userKey] === 1 ? '' : userDeviceCount[userKey];
            var newName = deptName + ' - ' + firstName + suffix;

            // Update if needed
            if (compGR.name.toString() !== newName) {
                var oldName = compGR.name.toString();
                compGR.name = newName;
                compGR.update();
                gs.info('Updated: ' + oldName + ' → ' + newName);
            }
        }
    }
}

})(inputs, outputs);
</value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value restrictedtrueon_desktopfalse2809952237b1300054b6a3549dbe5dd401970-01-03 00:00:00Submitting this item will update all computer names to use the format {DEPARTMENT - FIRST NAME}. For subsequent computers assigned to a user, the format {FIRST NAME2}, {FIRST NAME3}, etc. is used. For example:

FINANCE - JANE
FINANCE - JANE2
FINANCE - JANE3

Note: Only computer records saved directly in the cmdb_ci_computer table are updated. Records in child classes (e.g., cmdb_ci_server) are not updated.
